mapper.select: select r.contract_no as contractNo, h.ls_id as houseId, h.room_id as roomId, r.contract_date as confirmDate, r.contract_startdate as startDate, r.contract_month as life, r.contract_enddate as endDate, r.state as status, r.paymethod as payChannel, (select ID from orup_user o where o.loginName=a.telephone) as createNo, r.date, 'RENT' as type, 'ZJLX_SFZ' as cardType, r.renter_telephone as phone, r.renter_name as name, r.renter_idcard as idCardNo from rentlist r left join houselist h on r.house_id = h.house_id left join admin a on r.job_no = a.job_no WHERE r.date >= (now() - interval 4 hour) OR r.update_date >= (now() - interval 4 hour)
